Which of the following is the condition for a body to be in translational equilibrium?
questionList.a1: The resultant force on the body in any direction is zero
questionList.a2: The velocity of the body in any direction is zero
questionList.a3: No external force is acting on the body
questionList.a4: No work is done on the body
